entity1.name: Culture
entity1.description: A set of shared beliefs, customs, and traditions that are passed down through generations within a group of people.
entity1.chunkid: The Role of Education in Shaping Culture2

entity2.name: Schools
entity2.description: Educational institutions where cultural values and norms are taught to young individuals.
entity2.chunkid: The Role of Education in Shaping Culture5

entity3.name: history classes
entity3.description: A type of class that teaches students about past events, people, and societies.
entity3.chunkid: The Role of Education in Shaping Culture6

entity4.name: cultural achievements
entity4.description: Significant accomplishments in arts, science, literature, or other cultural fields by a society over time.
entity4.chunkid: The Role of Education in Shaping Culture6

entity5.name: society
entity5.description: A community of people living in a particular country or region and having shared customs, laws, and organizations.
entity5.chunkid: The Role of Education in Shaping Culture6

entity6.name: students
entity6.description: Individuals who are enrolled in an educational institution to learn or study.
entity6.chunkid: The Role of Education in Shaping Culture6

entity7.name: cultural heritage
entity7.description: The legacy of physical artifacts and intangible attributes of a group or society that are inherited from past generations, maintained in the present, and bestowed for the benefit of future generations.
entity7.chunkid: The Role of Education in Shaping Culture7

entity8.name: roots
entity8.description: The origins or background from which an individual or group has come, often referring to their cultural or familial history.
entity8.chunkid: The Role of Education in Shaping Culture7

entity9.name: traditional customs and practices
entity9.description: Long-established patterns of behavior and activities that are characteristic of a particular community or society, passed down through generations.
entity9.chunkid: The Role of Education in Shaping Culture7

entity10.name: students
entity10.description: A group of individuals who are learning or being taught.
entity10.chunkid: The Role of Education in Shaping Culture11

entity11.name: education
entity11.description: The process of receiving or giving systematic instruction, especially at a school or university.
entity11.chunkid: The Role of Education in Shaping Culture11

entity12.name: education
entity12.description: The process of facilitating learning, or the acquisition of knowledge, skills, values, beliefs, and habits.
entity12.chunkid: The Role of Education in Shaping Culture16

entity13.name: gender equality
entity13.description: The state where individuals are treated equally and have equal rights regardless of their gender.
entity13.chunkid: The Role of Education in Shaping Culture16

entity14.name: traditional gender roles
entity14.description: Societal norms that dictate behaviors, responsibilities, and activities considered appropriate for men and women based on cultural traditions.
entity14.chunkid: The Role of Education in Shaping Culture16

entity15.name: education
entity15.description: The process of facilitating learning, or the acquisition of knowledge, skills, values, beliefs, and habits.
entity15.chunkid: The Role of Education in Shaping Culture18

entity16.name: cultural hegemony
entity16.description: A sociopolitical theory that describes how a dominant group maintains power or control over other groups by imposing its own values, norms, and beliefs on them.
entity16.chunkid: The Role of Education in Shaping Culture18

entity17.name: dominant cultural values
entity17.description: The set of values, norms, and beliefs that are prevalent and influential within a dominant or majority group in society.
entity17.chunkid: The Role of Education in Shaping Culture18

entity18.name: marginalized groups
entity18.description: Groups of people who are excluded from the mainstream social, economic, educational, and political life of a community or society.
entity18.chunkid: The Role of Education in Shaping Culture18
